articles.content: Opinion Interpretation of the news based on evidence, including data, as well as anticipating how events might unfold based on past events

articles.title: Kenya identifies suspects in Italian woman's kidnapping
articles.description: Kenya identifies suspects in Italian woman's kidnapping and offers 1 million shilling reward
articles.content: NAIROBI, Kenya Kenyan police have identified three suspects in the kidnapping of an Italian woman and are offering a reward of one million shillings ($9,750) for information leading to their arrest. There has been no claim of responsibility for the first kidn… [+693 chars]

articles.content: ROME The Catholic Churchs global organization of nuns has denounced the culture of silence and secrecy surrounding sexual abuse in the church and is urging sisters who have been abused to report the crimes to police and their superiors. The International Unio… [+2586 chars]

articles.title: Nigeria's military acknowledges major attack by extremists
articles.description: Nigeria's military acknowledges major attack by extremists after lawmakers say 44 soldiers dead
articles.content: JOHANNESBURG Nigerias military is acknowledging a major attack against it by Islamic extremists after opposition lawmakers said 44 soldiers were killed. The statement issued overnight doesnt say how many are dead after the Nov. 18 attack in Metele in the nort… [+690 chars]

articles.author: Ian Livingston
articles.title: D.C.-area forecast: Icy spots may develop this morning before precipitation turns to rain
articles.description: This doesn't seem like a big ice threat, but it doesn't take much. It's all rain by midday.
articles.content: * Winter weather advisory from 6 a.m. to noon for most of the area near and west of Interstate 95 * TODAYS DAILY DIGIT 3/10: The only good thing about this weather is that we get closer to cementing the rain records for this much-too-wet year. EXPRESS FORECAS… [+2819 chars]

articles.title: At least 25 dead as bus falls into canal in southern India
articles.description: An official says at least 25 people were killed when a speeding bus fell into a canal in southern India
articles.content: BANGALORE, India At least 25 people, many of them schoolchildren, were killed when a speeding bus fell into a canal in southern India on Saturday, an official and media reports said. The accident occurred in Mandya district as the driver lost control of the v… [+959 chars]

articles.title: Theresa May's Brexit plan is much like the prime minister herself
articles.description: Careful and considered, practical and provincial, this is her deal.
articles.content: LONDON It can be painful to watch, the sneers and scoffing heaped upon the lonely prime minister and yet she soldiers on and on. Because this is her Brexit. Whatever happens next, good or bad, in this remarkable British moment will happen because of Theresa M… [+9027 chars]

articles.title: Bahrain votes for new parliament but opposition is absent
